DOC.brief_summary: This study ( `` Adjuvant Growth Hormone Study '' ) do see effect add Growth Hormone ( GH ) fertility treatment ( also call vitro fertilization IVF ) . Growth Hormone protein body normally produce . Growth Hormone act several different organ , include ovary , egg make . From evidence gather study do fertility doctor year , researcher believe woman become pregnant IVF past might better result go course Growth Hormone IVF treatment . However , research need do confirm whether add Growth Hormone beneficial also find best time start Growth Hormone treatment IVF . We hope Adjuvant Growth Hormone study help answer question .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Hormone Poor Responders IVF Trial
DOC.criteria: Subject prior poor response ( ) ovarian stimulation IVF ICSI . Poor response define history produce few four follicle ≥14 mm diameter previous COS cycle FSH HMG use cycle start daily dose ≥450 IU Age ≤ 45 year Baseline blood lab , measure within previous month , show fast blood glucose < 6.1 mmol/L TSH ≤ 5.5 mU/L Early follicular phase ( Day 2 Day 3 ) serum FSH , evaluate precede 6 month Subject willing able give inform consent Concurrently enrol clinical trial Previous participation study Using GnRH agonist COS protocol Any prior early follicular phase serum FSH level ≥12 IU/L Use follow contraindicated inappropriate : GH , Cetrotide® , FSH , LH hCG Used OCP within prior month Pregnant lactating Untreated hydrosalpinx Tobacco smoker Diabetic otherwise risk gestational diabetes BMI > 38 kg/m2 Poorly control thyroid disease Known cancer prior history malignancy
